climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: The Hero Difference – From the brand that brought you the award-winning Mighty Patch, our exfoliating daily face cleanser is the first step on your journey to clearer skin.

Handles 3 Common Acne-prone Skin Issues – Pore cleanser with AHA, BHA and PHA that: eliminates clogged-up grime and excess oil; gently buffs away dead skin and impurities; and resurfaces and evens tone.
Zero Fragrance Or Irritating Ingredients – Free of sulfates, parabens, phthalate and artificial colors, this cleanser is safe for all skin types.
Feels Amazing -- The luxurious jelly-to-foam texture leaves pores feeling free and your skin velvety soft – even before moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Interesting texture, beautiful results
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff. I used to be a staunch supporter of La Roche Posay Pigmentclar. I unfortunately left that $29 face wash in a hotel shower on vacation. Upon return I ended up looking for an affordable replacement as my wallet recovered from a Disney World summer vacation. I also wanted a wash with less fragrance in it. At first, I tried the Cocokind acid cleanser and absolutely hated it — it smelled awfully chemical, did not suds up even a little and did not leave my skin feeling clean. Sure my skin was somewhat hydrated because the soap was gentle, but I don’t feel the acids really worked as well as those in Pigmentclar to clear my skin and lighten dark spots.Enter this Hero cleanser. The bottle drew me in, I’ll admit. It’s not great for travel because there’s no way to lock the pump mechanism, so you’d have to port this to a different container.The texture is super jelly like and has very small pulp like particles mixed in. If anyone has ever used a peeling gel it kind of feels like those after you start rubbing them in. I think the particles in this cleanser act as a very gentle surface exfoliator. It has a very neutral smell, but not nasty or chemical.After wash, it leaves me clean but not stripped to the point of my skin being squeaky. It suds up satisfyingly but doesn’t overly dry me out. I use a pump and a half to wash. I have dry skin due to my PCOS medication. That being said I use acid face washes to keep my PCOS acne gently in check. I love this face wash for this purpose. It leaves my skin soft and I have absolutely seen an increase in the evenness of the texture and tone of my skin over the past two months of use; the acids are effective.Overall - I thoroughly enjoy this Hero wash more than the Pigmentclar. The price is right and the effect is better for my skin type (27, dry acne prone). I’d love to see a different pump that would be good for travel. I love the bottle because you can see the cool texture of the wash. Maybe there could be a mini version for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The exfoliating auction is very gentle, but thorough. No irritation, works for my sensitive skin. My skin is smooth after use, not dry, ready for the next step in my skin care routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good exfoliating cleanser
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Been using it got about a week and my skin already feels smoother and is more clear, so great results! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is I’m not a big fan of the scent and the texture is kinda weird, I was expecting more of a smooth gel and instead it’s thicker and kind of grainy, it’s hard to explain. I usually do 2 pumps in my hand, mix it up with water and then foam it up in my hands before applying it to my face and then it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like the consistency and texture of this cleanser. It leaves my skin clean and soft. I don’t use it every day, as it is a little drying for my sensitive dry skin. I alternate use with Cetaphil gentle cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've finally noticed a difference in my face+ this is a must have, I'm so impressed! The color in my face has gotten better and my over all complexion looks 😍 ✨️ 👌 💕They also make the pimple patch and let me tell u I'm even more impressed on that!Your face needs these acids feed it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE the packaging. Simple and sleek! Pleasant gel. No offensive scent. The texture is more to the gel side of an exfoliator so if you have sensitive skin, this is perfect for you. I like that it is gentle enough to use daily. It really is a great product however if you are looking for strong exfoliation, this is not for your face -but great for your hands!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best face cleanser!
reviews.reviewText: Any time I don’t buy hero face cleanser I begin to break out, it’s extremely cleansing but very gentle my face is so smooth after!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels so clean!
reviews.reviewText: This leaves your skin feeling so refreshed and clean. I absolutely love it for my daily routine.
